item.title: Scalability
item.description: Instantly search across all your datasets. Empower anyone to analyze or view findings. Everyone can analyze. Itâ€™s so easy to use. Quickly and broadly deploy easy-to-build dashboards.

item.title: Simplicity
item.description: Analyze data with little or no training. Create tables and charts. Filter data. Build dashboards in 5 minutes. Empower customers and clients to answer their own questions.

item.title: Speed
item.description: The CrunchDB columnar database is purpose built to handle even your largest survey datasets with millions of respondents, and thousands of variables.

item.title: Tool
item.description: Unlike generic BI tools, Crunch.io handles: Weighting Missingness Stats testing Multiple response questions Advanced analytics
